title: Interactive config editing from Ralph UI
description: Allow users to edit Ralph configuration (UI mode, default model, etc.) from within the running UI. Changes should be saved to ~/.config/ralphtools/config.json and take effect on next Ralph launch. Both Ink and Gum UIs should support this.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Pressing 'c' during Ralph execution opens config menu
Config menu shows current values for: UI mode (live/iteration/startup), default model, ntfy topic
User can navigate and change values using arrow keys and enter
UI shows 'Config saved - changes take effect on next run' confirmation
Pressing Escape or 'q' in config menu returns to main UI without saving
Gum fallback UI supports config editing if capable (nice-to-have)
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
